霼字的基本解释

霼
xì
见“叆”。

霼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》許既切，去未，曉。］
［《廣韻》虚豈切，上尾，曉。］
见“靉2霼”。

霼字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霼； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1379第21
【廣韻】虛豈切【韻會】許豈切，?音豨。【玉篇】靉霼，雲貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?許旣切，音欷。義同。　又【木華·海賦】彷像其色，靉霼其形。【註】靉霼，不審貌。【釋文】霼，虛氣反。

霼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
霼字的起名意思

暂无。

Fei

Fei
xì

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, Quwei, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Qiqi, Shangwei, Xiao. ]
See "叆2霼".
Fei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　霼; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1379 21
[Guang Yun] Xu Qiqie [Rhyme Club] Xu Qiqie,? Yinxun. [Jade articles] 叆霼, cloud appearance.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun] again? Xu Yiqie, sound. The same meaning.　[Muhua·Haifu] resembles its color and sharp shape. [Note] 叆霼, do not examine the appearance. [Explanation] Fei, anti-deficiency.
